</image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;8532f4f1.1503">   <title>We - Call for Contributions </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;8532f4f1.1503</link>   <description> Dear list members!<br><br>We are about to launch a new art project and would like to invite you to participate or support us in other ways \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd for example promote us. The project is simply called We. Our project description and call for contributions (cfc) are published at www.wepolter.org/call-for-contributions.<br><br>We is initiated by the Polterparty (www.wepolter.org) and supported by the Democracy School (www.democracyschool.com). Please do check us out. I think you will find this interesting. If you like the idea and can think of others who might like it too, please tell them about us. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T18:35:57+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Nico Andreas Heller</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;8532f4f1.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;4d463900.1503">   <title>RiDE Special Issue CfP: Responding to Intermediality </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;4d463900.1503</link>   <description> Dear All<br><br>a reminder that the deadline for the RiDE (Research in Drama Education: the Journal of Applied Theatre and Performance) special issue: Responding to Intermediality: How applied theatre and drama education engage with new intermedial forms, is on the 1st of April.<br><br>Please note that we are looking for a range of responses, including practitioner accounts, as well as academic papers. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-08T21:16:34+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Maria Chatzichristodoulou</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;4d463900.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;6850f638.1503">   <title>reminder - 14 March </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;6850f638.1503</link>   <description> Dear Cybertheatre makers,<br><br>This is a reminder.<br>Deadline for submitting works to the<br>virtual exhibition &quot;HOT WATER \ufffd\ufffd Water, Peace &amp; War&quot;<br>is 14 March 2015.<br>~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~<br><br>Artists, scientists, activists, teachers, youth are invited to upload<br>Videos (it can be documents of performances too), digital postcards, poems<br>or texts on the theme of \ufffd\ufffdHOT WATER\ufffd\ufffd: climate change, environmental<br>decline, rights violations, volatile<br>politics and conflict about water.<br>INFO http://bit.ly/HOT-WATER [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-06T18:37:33+10:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>suzon fuks</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;6850f638.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;d8ec4276.1502">   <title>CFP:: CyberSec2015- Indonesia </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;d8ec4276.1502</link>   <description> The Fourth International Conference on Cyber Security, Cyber Welfare, and<br>Digital Forensic (CyberSec2015)<br><br>http://sdiwc.net/conferences/cybersec2015/<br><br>Universitas Siswa Bangsa Internasional, Jakarta, Indonesia<br>29- 31, October 2015    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-28T19:52:06+03:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>The Fourth International Conference on Cyber Security, Cyber Welfare, and Digital Forensic (CyberSec2015)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;d8ec4276.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;6bb13ebd.1502">   <title>call to virtual exhibition - deadline extended </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;6bb13ebd.1502</link>   <description> Dear Cybertheatre makers,<br><br>I'd like to inform you that the deadline for submitting works to the<br>virtual exhibition &quot;HOT WATER \ufffd\ufffd Water, Peace &amp; War&quot; has been extended to<br>the 14 March 2015.<br>~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~<br><br>Artists, scientists, activists, teachers, youth are invited to upload<br>videos, digital postcards, poems or texts on the theme of \ufffd\ufffdHOT WATER\ufffd\ufffd:<br>climate change, environmental decline, rights violations, volatile<br>politics and conflict about water.<br>INFO http://bit.ly/HOT-WATER [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-20T16:57:41+10:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>suzon fuks</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;6bb13ebd.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;5503d58f.1501">   <title>"CyPosium - the book" - presentation and performance at Transmediale 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;5503d58f.1501</link>   <description> /*CyPo\ufffd\ufffdsium \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd the book*/ will be pre\ufffd\ufffdsented at Trans\ufffd\ufffdme\ufffd\ufffddi\ufffd\ufffdale 2015<br>&lt;http://transmediale.de/content/cyposium&gt;, with a repeat of the live<br>per\ufffd\ufffdfor\ufffd\ufffdmance from the book's launch in December. This cyber\ufffd\ufffdfor\ufffd\ufffdmance,<br>deliv\ufffd\ufffdered by some of the book\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds con\ufffd\ufffdtrib\ufffd\ufffdu\ufffd\ufffdtors and CyPo\ufffd\ufffdsium<br>organ\ufffd\ufffdis\ufffd\ufffders, combines read\ufffd\ufffdings from the book with impro\ufffd\ufffdvised visu\ufffd\ufffdals<br>includ\ufffd\ufffding web\ufffd\ufffdcam imagery and live drawing.<br><br>The pre\ufffd\ufffdsen\ufffd\ufffdta\ufffd\ufffdtion will take place online and in the Foyer at<br>Trans\ufffd\ufffdme\ufffd\ufffddi\ufffd\ufffdale, Berlin, from 2-3pm on Sun\ufffd\ufffdday 1 Feb\ufffd\ufffdru\ufffd\ufffdary 2015. Click<br>here to find your local time &lt;http://tinyurl.com/ljxjpxz&gt;. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-26T17:08:55+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>helen varley jamieson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;5503d58f.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;b65139de.1501">   <title>RiDE Call for Contributions: Responding to Intermediality </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;b65139de.1501</link>   <description> Call for Contributions<br><br>RiDE: the Journal of Applied Theatre &amp; Performance<br>Special themed issue (Vol. 21.3)<br>Co-edited by Dr. Maria Chatzichristodoulou (University of Hull, UK) and Dr. Mark Crossley (De Montfort University, UK)<br>Responding to intermediality<br>How applied theatre and drama education engage with new intermedial forms.<br><br>This themed issue of RiDE invites contributions from practitioners in the field of applied theatre and drama education that reflect upon the opportunities and challenges of the ever-increasing mutability of the dramatic form in contemporary cultures across the world. It builds upon the recent themed issue: Innovation, technology and converging practices in drama [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-15T20:40:46+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Maria Chatzichristodoulou</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;b65139de.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;af4d71c8.1412">   <title>CFP: IFTR Scenography Working Group Symposium at PQ'15 Prague June 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;af4d71c8.1412</link>   <description> \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdApologies for cross posting<br><br>IFTR Scenography Working Group Symposium at PQ\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd15<br>Thursday 25th June \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Saturday 27th June 2015, Prague \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Czech Republic<br><br>For the first time, the Scenography Working Group of the IFTR/FIRT have been invited by Sodja Lotker, (Artistic Director of PQ) and the Czech Arts and Theatre Institute to convene an academic symposium as an integral part of the Prague Quadrennial 2015 schedule. The symposium will take place between Thursday 25th and Saturday 27th June 2015 in the Baroque Colloredo Mansfeld Palace (Kra\ufffd\ufffdlovska\ufffd\ufffd cesta), which will be the central space of PQ\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd15. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-20T09:43:07+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Nick Hunt</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;af4d71c8.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;6ab0f574.1412">   <title>CFP for IFTR Scenography Working Group - Hyderabad 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;6ab0f574.1412</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;6ab0f574.1412">CFP for IFTR Scenography Working Group - Hyderabad 2015 </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-12-17T23:56:34+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Nick Hunt</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;6ab0f574.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;86a1d9bf.1412">   <title>CFP Reminder: Media Art Histories 2015: Re-Create (Deadline Jan 12, 2015) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;86a1d9bf.1412</link>   <description> RE-CREATE 2015<br><br>The 10th anniversary and sixth international conference on the histories<br>of Media, Art Science and Technology<br><br>Reminder DEADLINE extended January 12, 2015<br><br>Hexagram, Concordia University and Universit\ufffd\ufffd du Qu\ufffd\ufffdbec \ufffd\ufffd Montr\ufffd\ufffdal<br>in collaboration with Media@McGill and CIRMMT- McGill Montr\ufffd\ufffdal, Canada.<br>5-8 November 2015<br>Re-Create CFP Submission:<br>http://moodle.donau-uni.ac.at/recreate/openconf.php<br><br>Re-Create 2015, the sixth international Conference on the<br>Histories of Media Art, Science and Technology will mark<br>the 10th Anniversary of the Re conference series. Re-Create 2015<br>is devoted to exploring what theories, methodologies and<br>techniques can be used to understand past, present and indeed,<br>future paradigms of creative material practice [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-16T23:08:51+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Image Science</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;86a1d9bf.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;527b106b.1412">   <title>PhD Scholarship opportunity University of Hull: Digital Curation, Memory & Archives </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;527b106b.1412</link>   <description> Hello<br><br>Please see below an opportunity for a PhD Scholarship opportunity in Digital Curation, Memory &amp; Archives at the University of Hull:<br><br>http://www2.hull.ac.uk/student/scholarships/artsandsocialscience/memorydigitalcuration.aspx<br><br>We are looking for an excellent candidate to undertake original research in this area. If you think you fulfil the brief and are interested in applying please feel free to contact me directly for further info. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-11T13:39:51+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Maria Chatzichristodoulou</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;527b106b.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;11cebad.1412">   <title>Networked Performance Exhibition tour and Book launch </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;11cebad.1412</link>   <description> The net artists Gretta Louw and Helen Varley Jamieson warmly invite you<br>to the Gastatelier, PLATFORM (Munich) on Friday 12 December at 19.00,<br>for an evening of networked performance: an exhibition tour and the<br>launch of &quot;CyPosium - the book&quot;, with online performative readings.<br><br>You can also attend the book launch online:<br>http://www.cyposium.net/event/launch-cyposium-the-book/<br><br>The exhibition &quot;Net Work&quot; is curated by Gretta Louw, the current guest<br>artist at PLATFORM. The exhibition deals with work that is located at<br>the intersection of performance and net art. The emerging genre of<br>networked performance makes strong statements about the development of<br>art history, and [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-09T10:31:31+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>helen varley jamieson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;11cebad.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;79a27ffb.1411">   <title>HOT WATER - Water, Peace & War. Call for Contributions </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;79a27ffb.1411</link>   <description> Dear Cybertheatres members,<br>leading up to the revamp of water-wheel.net and to celebrate its first 3<br>years, we have launched a call for contributions on the theme of &quot;HOT WATER<br>- Water, Peace &amp; War&quot;. It would be great if you could contribute, and spread<br>the word to people you know and networks you are part of. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-12T20:52:28+10:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Suzon Fuks</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;79a27ffb.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;bdc5890a.1411">   <title>Networked Bodies event NOW at Watermans </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;bdc5890a.1411</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues<br><br>This is a reminder for Networked Bodies, a long weekend of performances, talks, installations and workshops exploring networks and networked performance practices happening NOW at Watermans, today 8 and tomorrow 9 November.<br><br>I hope you can join us!<br><br>All best<br>Maria   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-08T10:20:30+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Maria Chatzichristodoulou</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;bdc5890a.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;4a4a17f9.1411">   <title>today: live from Brisbane River bank </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;4a4a17f9.1411</link>   <description> Hi!<br><br>TODAY, please join our LIVE STREAM http://water-wheel.net/taps/view/783<br>Find your time http://bit.ly/NetBodies-Symposium \ufffd\ufffd you are welcome to arrive<br>30minutes before.<br><br>James Cunningham and I will enact a slow walking performance on the bank of<br>Brisbane River, recounting creek walks around Queensland and the Waterwheel<br>network.<br>An ONLINE PERFORMATIVE PRESENTATION as part of the Networked Bodies<br>Symposium in London, at Watermans \ufffd\ufffd happening simultaneously.<br>\ufffd\ufffdStreamed river walk, recounting an embodied environmental networked<br>performance practice\ufffd\ufffd. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-08T09:20:16+10:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>suzon fuks</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;4a4a17f9.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;520268cc.1411">   <title>"Digital Handshake" - date correction! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;520268cc.1411</link>   <description> my apologies for a mistake in the announcement i sent last night - the<br>date of the /Digital Handshake/ performance is *Saturday 8 November,<br>6.30pm UK time* (Sunday 9th if you're somewhere like NZ/Aotearoa).<br><br>====<br><br>Join us online this weekend for an improvised cyberformance on the topic<br>of networked bodies, /Digital Handshake/, as part of the event Networked<br>Bodies - Digital Performance Weekender<br>&lt;http://issuu.com/mirena/docs/networked_bodies_programme_a2c24d4f34fbef&gt; (7-9<br>November). The performance will take place simultaneously online and at<br>Watermans &lt;http://www.watermans.org.uk/&gt; in London, at *6.30pm UK time<br>on Saturday 8 November 2014*. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-08T11:18:13+13:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>helen varley jamieson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;520268cc.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;52da24ed.1411">   <title>"Digital Handshake" - live online this weekend </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;52da24ed.1411</link>   <description> Join us online this weekend for an improvised cyberformance on the topic<br>of networked bodies, /Digital Handshake/, as part of the event Networked<br>Bodies - Digital Performance Weekender<br>&lt;http://issuu.com/mirena/docs/networked_bodies_programme_a2c24d4f34fbef&gt; (7-9<br>November). The performance will take place simultaneously online and at<br>Watermans &lt;http://www.watermans.org.uk/&gt; in London, at *6.30pm UK time<br>on Saturday 7 November 2014*.<br><br>Find your local time here &lt;http://tinyurl.com/ptyrrve&gt;; a link to the<br>stage will be available *here* &lt;http://upstage.org.nz/blog/?p=6272&gt; half<br>an hour before show-time. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-07T22:56:47+13:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>helen varley jamieson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;52da24ed.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;4947cbc7.1410">   <title>Networked Bodies @ Watermans, 9-7 November </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;4947cbc7.1410</link>   <description> Dear All<br><br>Please join us at Watermans for three days of 'networked bodies' with exhibitions/ installations, performances, workshops and a symposium.<br><br>best wishes<br>Maria X<br>:<br><br>NETWORKED BODIES<br>Digital Performance Weekender<br>Friday 7 - Sunday 9 November 2014<br>Watermans<br><br>Programme of events: http://issuu.com/mirena/docs/networked_bodies_programme_a2c24d4f34fbef &lt;http://issuu.com/mirena/docs/networked_bodies_programme_a2c24d4f34fbef&gt;<br>Bookings: http://watermans.ticketsolve.com/shows/873523000/events?show_id=873523000<br><br>Networks are at the heart of how we live today. Networks generate transnational zones of action, bring together communities, circulate knowledge and information, expand spheres of influence, contaminate ideas, germinate exchanges, foster innovation, and facilitate distribution of power. However, networks are unfairly distributed and closely monitored. Geopolitical injustices and dominant political and economic forces [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-24T20:16:46+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Maria Chatzichristodoulou</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;4947cbc7.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;df87ad49.1408">   <title>The ARCHIVE OF DIGITAL ART 2.0 is online! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;df87ad49.1408</link>   <description> The ARCHIVE OF DIGITAL ART 2.0 is online!<br><br>Since its foundation in 1999, the ARCHIVE OF DIGITAL ART (former<br>Database of Virtual Art) has become the most important scholarly online<br>archive for media art. In cooperation with established media artists,<br>researchers, and institutions, it has been documenting the rapidly<br>evolving world of digital art and its related fields for more than a<br>decade and today contains a selection of thousands of artwork at the<br>intersection of art, science, and technology. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-26T12:50:33+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Michaela Seiser</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;df87ad49.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;2b5cb803.1408">   <title>Extended Deadline: INTER-FACE_International Conference 2014 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;2b5cb803.1408</link>   <description> INTER-FACE_International Conference on Live Interfaces 2014<br><br>http://icli.lurk.org<br><br>IMPORTANT DATES<br><br>* EXTENDED abstract submission deadline: August 31st, 2014<br>* Notification of selected works: September 15th, 2014<br>* Camera-ready deadline for accepted papers: November 1st, 2014<br>* Conference: November 20th-23rd, 2014<br><br>Dr Maria Chatzichristodoulou<br>Lecturer in Performance and New Media<br>School of Drama, Music and Screen    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-20T09:26:58+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Maria Chatzichristodoulou</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;2b5cb803.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;57e484b8.1407">   <title>PR Listing request </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;57e484b8.1407</link>   <description> _Please include the following in your listings - regards Performance<br>Research:_<br><br>CALL FOR PROPOSALS:ON RUINS AND RUINATION<br><br>PERFORMANCE RESEARCH 20.3 (JUNE 2015)<br><br>PROPOSAL DEADLINE: 29 AUGUST 2014 (SEE BELOW FOR DETAILS)<br><br>Issue editors Carl Lavery (University of Glasgow) and Richard Gough<br>(CPR/Falmouth Unversity)<br><br>Whether or not we believe in Slavoj _\ufffd\ufffdi\ufffd\ufffdek_'s prognostic about living in<br>the end of times, the fact remains that everywhere we turn we are<br>assailed by ruins, a world of crumbling matter, a world of dust, a world<br>in decay. Things that come to mind randomly, and perhaps too obviously:<br>World War 2 bunkers, Cold War [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-24T15:00:00+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Performance Research Journal</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;57e484b8.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;b833b2c7.1407">   <title>Fwd: Access space digithon, this Saturday from 7am for 24 hours straight </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CYBERTHEATRES;b833b2c7.1407</link>   <description> sounds like an interesting event :)<br><br>-------- Original Message --------<br>Subject: [NEW-MEDIA-CURATING] Access space digithon, this Saturday from<br>7am for 24 hours straight<br>Date: Wed, 16 Jul 2014 00:19:07 +0100<br>From: alex &lt;alex@SLAB.ORG&gt;<br>Reply-To: alex &lt;alex@SLAB.ORG&gt;<br>To: NEW-MEDIA-CURATING@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br><br>Hi all,<br><br>For 24 hours straight from 7am BST this Saturday 19th July, we'll be<br>streaming a live Digithon from Access Space in Sheffield.
